eu.ist.astra.am.controller
Class ApplicationManagerController

java.lang.Object
  eu.ist.astra.am.controller.ApplicationManagerController

public class ApplicationManagerController
extends java.lang.Object

It implements the controller part of the application following the MVC architectural pattern (Adapted to SWING based on the article: http://www.developer.com/design/article.php/3678856)

Author:
David Rozas

Nested Class Summary
(package private)  class ApplicationManagerController.MyApplicationsThread
          This class extends SwinWorker to allow the creation of threads which loads the local applications in my applications tab
(package private)  class ApplicationManagerController.RepositoryApplicationsThread
          This class extends SwinWorker to allow the creation of threads which loads the Repository applications
(package private)  class ApplicationManagerController.SimilarApplicationsThread
          This class extends SwinWorker to allow the creation of threads which loads the local applications in the similar applications tree

private  boolean anyCommunitySelected(javax.swing.JTable table)
          It analyzes the communities selected by the user and returns true if at least one was selected in the given table.

          Returns a array of objects with the needed information about the communities to be represented as a table by the JTable

          Returns the remote help content, null if there was any problem.
static ApplicationManagerController getInstance()
          It returns an instance of the controller (which will be unique)
 java.lang.Object[][] getRulesData(java.lang.String[] rules)
          Returns a array of objects with the needed information about the rules to be represented as a table by the JTable For the moment only the indentifier is displayed (there is no name or description)
 void importApplication()
          Performs all the necesary operations to import the application from the repository.
private static void installLnF()
          It installs the standard Look and Feel
 boolean isEligibleNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node)
          It returns true if the node is eligible to retrieve information of it.
 void loadMyApplications()
          It loads all the applications which belongs to this user in my applications tree.
 void loadMyApplicationsApplicationInfo()
          It loads all the information of certain application selected in MyApplications and shows it in the relevant fields.
 void loadRepositoryApplicationInfo()
          It loads all the information of certain repository application, and shows them in the relevant fields An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.
 void loadRepositoryApplications()
          It loads all the repository applications in the repository tree.
 void loadSearchApplicationInfo()
          Loads the application information for a result of searching
 void loadSimilarApplicationInfo()
          It loads all the information of certain similar application and shows it in the relevant fields An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.
 void loadSimilarApplications()
          It loads all the applications which belongs to this user in similar applications tree.
private  void loadTags(java.lang.String appId)
          It loads all the public and private tags in the list of tags of MyApplications
 void login()
          Implements the login process, and creates the main window if the process is correct
 void logout()
          Implements the logout process
private  void retrieveApplication(java.lang.String appId)
          It allows the user to retrieve an application.
 void retrieveApplicationFromSearch()
          It performs all the checking related to get an application from the searching process, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application
 void retrieveApplicationFromSimilaritySearch()
          It performs all the checking related to get an application from a similarity searching process, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application
 void retrieveApplicationFromTree()
          It performs all the checking related to get an application from the Repository tree, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application

public void setAddTagName(javax.swing.JTextField textArea)
Sets the communities radio button in the add tag window (to be called by model)

setBundleContext

public void setBundleContext(BundleContext bc)
Sets the bundle context in the model (which is only accessed from the model)

Parameters:
bc - Bundle context

start

public void start()
It implements all the necessary operations to be done when the application is started

stop

public void stop()
It implements all the necessary operations to be done when the application is stopped

login

public void login()
Implements the login process, and creates the main window if the process is correct

logout

public void logout()
Implements the logout process

loadMyApplications

public void loadMyApplications()
It loads all the applications which belongs to this user in my applications tree. It creates a thread to load the tree hierarchy.

loadMyApplicationsApplicationInfo

public void loadMyApplicationsApplicationInfo()
It loads all the information of certain application selected in MyApplications and shows it in the relevant fields. An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.

shareApplicationFromTree

public void shareApplicationFromTree()
It performs all the checking related to share an application in the Repository tree, and calls the function which is in charge of sharing and adapting the application. In this case this operation in only performed by one of the widgets, but in this way the shareApplication method is completely general.

loadRepositoryApplications

public void loadRepositoryApplications()
It loads all the repository applications in the repository tree. An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.

loadRepositoryApplicationInfo

public void loadRepositoryApplicationInfo()
It loads all the information of certain repository application, and shows them in the relevant fields An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.

retrieveApplicationFromTree

public void retrieveApplicationFromTree()
It performs all the checking related to get an application from the Repository tree, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application

search

public void search()
Searches for an application and displays the results

retrieveApplicationFromSearch

public void retrieveApplicationFromSearch()
It performs all the checking related to get an application from the searching process, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application

loadSearchApplicationInfo

public void loadSearchApplicationInfo()
Loads the application information for a result of searching

loadSimilarApplications

public void loadSimilarApplications()
It loads all the applications which belongs to this user in similar applications tree. It creates a thread to load the tree hierarchy.

searchBySimilarity

public void searchBySimilarity()
Searches for a simmilar application and displays the results

loadSimilarApplicationInfo

public void loadSimilarApplicationInfo()
It loads all the information of certain similar application and shows it in the relevant fields An error message is shown if there are any connectivity problems with the back-end.

retrieveApplicationFromSimilaritySearch

public void retrieveApplicationFromSimilaritySearch()
It performs all the checking related to get an application from a similarity searching process, and calls the function which is in charge of retrieving and adapting the application

shareApplication

private void shareApplication(java.lang.String appId)
It allows the user to share an application. For the moment the user has to select communities and rules which he wants to share, and a dialog explaining that the OntologyManager services for helping him is shown.

Parameters:
appId - Application to be retrieved

getCommunitiesData

public java.lang.Object[][] getCommunitiesData()
                                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns a array of objects with the needed information about the communities to be represented as a table by the JTable

Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

endSharing

public void endSharing()
Performs all the necesary operations once the sharing process is done/cancelled.

exportApplication

public void exportApplication()
Performs all the necesary operations to store the application in the repository.

retrieveApplication

private void retrieveApplication(java.lang.String appId)
It allows the user to retrieve an application. For the moment the user has to select the rules which he wants to retrieve, and a dialog explaining that the OntologyManager services for helping him is shown.

Parameters:
appId - Application to be retrieved

endRetrieving

public void endRetrieving()
Performs all the necesary operations once the retrieving process is done/cancelled.

importApplication

public void importApplication()
Performs all the necesary operations to import the application from the repository.

visualizeRemoteRule

public void visualizeRemoteRule()
It shows the description of the rule in the application adaptation window.

visualizeLocalRule

public void visualizeLocalRule()
It shows the description of the rule in the application sharing window.

public void showHelpMenu()

public java.lang.String getHelpContent()
Returns the remote help content, null if there was any problem.

endHelp

public void endHelp()
Performs all the necesary operations once the help window is closed

public void showTagWindow()
Performs all the necessary operations to display the add tag window

saveTag

public void saveTag()
Performs all the operations to save a tag using the information given by the user in the addTagWindow.

deleteTag

public void deleteTag()
Performs all the necessary operations to delete a tag taking into account its scope.

endAddTag

public void endAddTag()
Performs all the necesary operations once the add tag window is closed

               throws java.rmi.RemoteException

getApplicationType

public java.lang.String getApplicationType(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node)
It returns the application type, given the node. It asks the repository of the Awareness Application Manager depending on the tree's root

Parameters:
appId - Application Identifier in Astra standard format
Returns:
Application type if there were no problems, null otherwise

getRulesData

public java.lang.Object[][] getRulesData(java.lang.String[] rules)
Returns a array of objects with the needed information about the rules to be represented as a table by the JTable For the moment only the indentifier is displayed (there is no name or description)

isEligibleNode

public boolean isEligibleNode(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode node)
It returns true if the node is eligible to retrieve information of it.

Parameters:
node - Node to be analyzed
Returns:
True if the node is eligible, false otherwise

anyCommunitySelected

private boolean anyCommunitySelected(javax.swing.JTable table)
It analyzes the communities selected by the user and returns true if at least one was selected in the given table.

Parameters:
table - Table to be checked
Returns:
True if any community was selected, false otherwise.
